streamArn.description: The ARN for a Kinesis data stream. This must exist in the same account and region as the DynamoDB table.

tableName.description:
The name of the DynamoDB table. There
can only be one Kinesis streaming destination for a given DynamoDB table.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering KinesisStreamingDestination resources.
